publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4179 Linda Fabiani: Planning for Success—That the Parliament congratulates all of the Scottish sportswomen and sportsmen who represented our nation at the Commonwealth Games in Melbourne; welcomes the record number of gold medal winners wearing Scotland’s colours, and looks forward to the delivery of the promised provision of sports facilities and training facilities throughout the country in order to aid the campaign for a Scottish Olympic team to compete for medals in the 30th Olympiad in London in 2012.
S2M-4179 Planning for Success (lodged on 27 March 2006) Michael Matheson*

S2M-4179 Planning for Success (lodged on 27 March 2006) Carolyn Leckie*, Rob Gibson*, Campbell Martin*, Chris Ballance*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Bruce Crawford*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Brian Adam*, Ms Sandra White*, Alex Neil*

S2M-4179 Linda Fabiani: Planning for Success—That the Parliament congratulates all of the Scottish sportswomen and sportsmen who represented our nation at the Commonwealth Games in Melbourne; welcomes the record number of gold medal winners wearing Scotland’s colours, and looks forward to the delivery of the promised provision of sports facilities and training facilities throughout the country in order to aid the campaign for a Scottish Olympic team to compete for medals in the 30th Olympiad in London in 2012. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Carolyn Leckie, Rob Gibson, Campbell Martin, Chris Ballance, Nicola Sturgeon, Mr Adam Ingram, Bruce Crawford, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White, Alex Neil, Mr John Swinney, Fiona Hyslop, Tricia Marwick, Tommy Sheridan
